entries: You're at home blazing trails in the burning sands, and you made a living guiding or following creatures in the desert. You might be a native nomad, an experienced desert guide, a naturalist, a bandit driven into the dunes by the law—or all of the above.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Survival} skill and the {@skill Lore||Desert Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Experienced Tracker} skill feat.
